page.title: 14A Holiday Home
page.content: {Skylarks}is a holiday home for disabled people. It is run by the {Winged Fellowship Trust.}The attractive modern building is on Holme Pierrepont Lane. From the home there are lovely views over the river valley to Nottingham and Colwick woods. Disabled people can come to {Skylarks}for one or two weeks holiday in the year. The staff and volunteers look after them and help them and take them out for various activities. As they are near the Watersports Centre they can use the facilities there. Our school has raised money to help {Skylarks.}We have had a competition to grow the biggest sunflower and asked people to sponser us for each centimetre of the flower.
